professional_summary: SQL Server Developer with database administration skills and Business Intelligence Developer experience using SQL Server Management Studio and Microsoft Business Intelligence Development Studio. Expertise in ETL solutions, data validation, SSRS report generation, and database design.

key_responsibilities: Created an ETL solution for Product
Developed SSRS reports using Tablix control for automatic delivery.

Maintained Access and SQL Server databases for monthly dashboard reports.
Extracted expense data from SAP for various report versions.
Created and maintained relational databases for testing and production.
Solved database access and permission issues.
Assisted in backup and recovery of databases.

Bachelor of Business Administration in Risk Management/Information Systems
